doc:
John Collin (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Collin_(actor) 0 John Collin (18 October 1928 – 25 February 1987) was a British actor frequently seen on UK television during the 1960s and 1970s, mainly in supporting roles. Collin's best-known role was as Detective Sergeant Haggar in the long running BBC police series Z-Cars. Another notable role was as Guardian officer Tom Weston in the 1971 ITV political fantasy The Guardians. He also played Mr. Alderson, the father-in-law of James Herriot, in both the television movie All Creatures Great and Small and the subsequent television series. John_Collin ( 18_October_1928 – 25_February_1987 ) was a_British_actor frequently_seen on UK_television during the_1960s_and_1970s , mainly in supporting roles . Collin 's_best-known_role was as Detective_Sergeant_Haggar in the_long_running_BBC_police_series_Z-Cars . Another_notable_role was as Guardian_officer_Tom_Weston in the_1971_ITV_political_fantasy The_Guardians . He also played Mr._Alderson , the_father-in-law of James_Herriot , in both the_television_movie All_Creatures Great_and_Small and the_subsequent_television_series .
